author: Stereogum
title: Watch Stephen Colbert Cover Talking Heads’ “Once In A Lifetime” At Montclair Film Festival Fundraiser
text: Stephen Colbert lives in Montclair, NJ, and he's long been a supporter of the Montclair Film Festival. During an '80s-themed fundraiser for the event on Saturday night, he broke out some of his best David Byrne dance moves while covering Talking Heads' 1981 hit "Once In A Lifetime." His suit wasn't quite big enough, but … More »
